title: Disentangling AGN Feedback and Sloshing in the Perseus Cluster with XRISM: Insights from Simulations
summary: High-resolution X-ray spectroscopy with XRISM has revealed complex, non-monotonic velocity dispersion profiles in the Perseus cluster, pointing to a complex interplay between at least two physical drivers of motions caused by dynamical processes within the intracluster medium (ICM). To further explore this conclusion, we perform a suite of idealized, controlled simulations targeting the relative roles of merger-induced sloshing and active galactic nucleus (AGN) feedback. Our models systematically isolate and combine these mechanisms to predict observable velocity profiles and X-ray line shapes, providing direct comparison to XRISM and Hitomi data. We find that neither sloshing nor AGN activity alone can reproduce the observed velocity dispersion profile; only their combined action matches the elevated dispersions both at the cluster core and outskirts. Power-spectrum analysis reveals distinct spatial signatures: sloshing generates large-scale coherent motions, while AGN feedback injects turbulence and broadens the velocity spectrum at small scales, especially in the core. By forward-modeling spectral line profiles, we show how these dynamics imprint unique observational signatures on X-ray emission. Our results underscore the necessity of accounting for both large-scale and small-scale drivers of gas motions in the ICM when interpreting high-resolution spectroscopic data, and provide guidance for the analysis of forthcoming XRISM observations.

AI.tldr: 利用高分辨率X射线光谱发现英仙座星系团（Perseus cluster）内存在由合并引发的液面振荡（sloshing）和活动星系核（AGN）反馈共同驱动的非单调速度弥散分布，揭示必须同时考虑星系团内介质（ICM）中大尺度相干运动和小尺度湍流才能解释观测数据。
AI.background: 研究主题为利用高分辨率X射线光谱学（X-ray spectroscopy）探究英仙座星系团（Perseus cluster）内由星系团内介质（ICM）动力学过程驱动的气体运动机制，重点关注合并引发的晃动（sloshing）与活动星系核（AGN）反馈的相互作用。
AI.data: data：研究采用高分辨率X射线光谱仪XRISM和Hitomi的观测数据，并结合理想化控制模拟（controlled simulations）生成的模拟数据，系统分析星系团内介质（ICM）速度弥散剖面和X射线谱线形态。
AI.method: 采用理想化控制模拟方法，系统分离并合并了合并诱导晃动（sloshing）和活动星系核（AGN）反馈机制，通过前向建模谱线轮廓预测可观测速度剖面和X射线线形。
AI.result: 仅靠冷流振荡（sloshing）或活动星系核（AGN）反馈均无法重现观测到的速度弥散剖面，二者共同作用才能匹配星系团核心和外围的高弥散值。

title: Pre-perihelion detection of a wobbling high-latitude jet in the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS
summary: We present observations of the detection of a faint high-latitude jet in the inner coma of comet 3I/ATLAS that coincides with the broad plume detected in visible images along PA $280 \pm 10^{\circ}$. A detailed analysis shows that the jet was clearly detected on seven nights (2025, August~3, 5, 18, 19, 21, 24, and~29). The jet maintains an almost, though not perfectly, constant position angle (PA) throughout these epochs. High-precision PA measurements at a projected distance of 6000~km from the cometary optocenter reveal a periodic modulation centered at ~ 280 degrees, consistent with a high-latitude jet undergoing precessional motion around the sky-projected spin axis of the nucleus. This is the first periodic jet-angle modulation detected in an interstellar comet. The derived periodicity of $7.74 \pm 0.35$ h may imply a nucleus rotation period of $P_{\mathrm{rot}} = 15.48 \pm 0.70$ h if the jet originates from a single active source near one of the poles. This value is slightly shorter than the period of $P_{\mathrm{rot}} = 16.79 \pm 0.23$ h derived from the photometric time series. From the measured PA range, the sky-projected orientation of the spin axis is derived as $\mathrm{PA} = 280.7 \pm 0.2^{\circ}$

AI.tldr: 首次在星际彗星3I/ATLAS内彗发中探测到高纬度喷流（high-latitude jet），其位置角（PA）呈现周期性调制（周期7.74±0.35小时），表明核自转周期可能为15.48±0.70小时，并推算出核自转轴投影方向为PA=280.7±0.2度。
AI.background: 首次在星际彗星3I/ATLAS的内彗发中探测到与可见光图像中宽羽流（broad plume）重合的高纬度微弱喷流（high-latitude jet），并发现其喷流角度存在周期性调制现象。
AI.data: 数据来源于2025年8月3日、5日、18日、19日、21日、24日和29日七个夜晚对彗星3I/ATLAS内彗发中微弱高纬度喷流（high-latitude jet）的观测。
AI.method: 采用高精度位置角（PA）测量和周期性调制分析技术，结合进动运动模型推断彗核自转轴投影方向及周期。
AI.result: 首次在星际彗星中探测到高纬度喷流（high-latitude jet）的周期性角度调制，其调制周期为7.74±0.35小时，暗示核自转周期可能为15.48±0.70小时。

title: The stellar to sub-stellar masses transition in 47 Tuc
comment: 12 pages, 8 figures, 3 tables. Accepted for publication on A&A
summary:
Context: The study of the Globular Cluster 47 Tuc offers the opportunity to shed new light on the debated issue on the presence of multiple populations in Globular Clusters, as recent results from HST photometry and high-resolution spectroscopy outlined star-to-star differences in the surface chemical composition.
  Aims: The goal of the present investigation is the interpretation of recent JWST data of the low main sequence of 47 Tuc, in order to explore the stellar to sub-stellar transition, to derive the mass distribution of the individual sources and to disentangle stars from different populations.
  Methods: Stellar evolution modelling of low-mass stars of metallicity [Fe/H]=-0.78 and oxygen content [O/Fe]=+0.4 and [O/Fe]=0 is used to simulate the evolution of the first and the second generation of the cluster. The comparison between the calculated sequences with the data points is used to characterize the individual objects, to split the different stellar components and to infer the current mass function of the cluster.
  Results: The first generation of 47 Tuc harbours 45 % of the overall population of the cluster, the remaining 55 % making up the second generation. The transition from the stellar to the sub-stellar domain is found at $0.074 M_{\odot}$ and $0.07 M_{\odot}$ for the first and second generations, respectively. The mass function of both the stellar generations are consistent with a Kroupa-like profile down to $0.22 M_\odot$.

AI.tldr: 通过模拟球状星团47 Tuc（47 Tucanae）中低质量恒星的演化并结合JWST观测数据，发现第一代恒星占星团总体的45%，第二代占55%，并确定了第一代和第二代恒星向亚恒星（sub-stellar）过渡的质量分别为0.074和0.07太阳质量，且两代恒星的质量函数在0.22太阳质量以下均符合Kroupa型分布。
AI.background: 研究背景聚焦于利用球状星团47 Tuc（47 Tucanae）探讨球状星团中多星族（multiple populations）的存在争议，结合HST（哈勃空间望远镜）测光和高分辨率光谱揭示的表面化学成分差异。
AI.data: 数据来源为JWST（James Webb Space Telescope）对球状星团47 Tuc低主序带的观测数据。
AI.method: 采用恒星演化模型（stellar evolution modelling）模拟金属丰度[Fe/H]=-0.78、氧含量[O/Fe]=+0.4和[O/Fe]=0的低质量恒星演化，以区分球状星团47 Tuc中不同星族并推断其质量函数。
AI.result: 47 Tuc第一代星族占星团总星数的45%，第二代占55%。
